page.title: 11THE A.C.A.
page.content: The A.C.A. started in mid. 1982 with a small Bedford bus . It picked senior citizens from door to door on sundays to take them on mystery tours. They soon got bigger and better buses. Nobody who helps gets paid and the money to pay for the buses comes from donations. They take small children to old people and they have to pay. The normal bus routes are half the price and the clubs pay 15p to 20p. They have 7 buses, 7 cars and a van. they are not getting anymore buses but are thinking about getting another garage as it would make it easier .
